groups.label: WindowWait_Draw_LittleMemoryReport
groups.text:
This Flipnote is at the
maximum possible size.

Save it now or delete a page.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Draw_TransformConfirm
groups.text:
Apply changes? You may not
be able to revert these changes
once they have been made.

Please note that this operation
may take a little while.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Draw_TransformCancelConfirm
groups.text:
Are you sure you want to exit
without applying changes?

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_InvalidSound
groups.text:
Could not load because of
invalid Nintendo 3DS Sound
data.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Draw_EraseAllConfirm
groups.text:
Delete all pages of
the current Flipnote?

Sounds and 3D effects will
also be deleted.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Draw_CameraError
groups.text:
An error has occurred with
the camera.

groups.label: WindowWait_Draw_TransformMemoryFull
groups.text:
This Flipnote is at the
maximum possible size.

You cannot edit it any further.
